description:
While Yahoo has aired the Season 6 finale of "Community" and teased there's more to come from the show, star Joel McHale has already lined up his next job, and it's a good one. McHale has been cast as a guest star in FOX's revival of "The X-Files," according to The Hollywood Reporter.雅虎正在播出《社区大学》第六季大结局，并表示还会有更多相关细节即将公布的时候，剧中男星Joel McHale已经找到了下家，而且还是个很有实力的下家。《好莱坞报道者》报道，McHale已经在FOX的重生剧《X档案》中担任客串明星。

He will play Tad O'Malley, who's described as an anchor at a conservative Internet news network. Somehow that position puts him in touch with Fox Mulder (David Duchovny), to whom he becomes an "unlikely ally."他将会在剧中扮演一个名叫Tad O'Malley的角色，是个保守派的新闻网站的重要人物。他的职务也让他有了和Fox Mulder接触的机会，不过两人应该不会是可以变成盟友的关系。

"The X-Files" will return for six episodes on Jan. 24, 2016, after ending its nine-season original run in 2002.《X档案》将会在2016年1月24日起回归，一共有6集。《X档案》原剧在9年前的2002年季终。

title: 经典美剧《X档案》明年年初复活
